channel.title: Project Insanity (Roles back)
channel.description: I'm helping a friend out but i'm not sure how to fix. when my mate in combat with npc or a player and if i disconnect my router or my internet gets disconnected It roles him back Can someone tell me were to fix. i can fix but idk were. Thanks.

item.title: Project Insanity (Roles back)
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Just add a method in PlayerHandler that extends PI’s playerSave and add an import in your Client.java that utilizes it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity (Roles back)
item.dc:creator: @b4k_2_lumby b4k 2 lumby
item.description:
@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

is he in your house? Or are you hosting? If your hosting and you dc your router the server will rollback when you connect it back. That is normal

Read full topic
